mapper.select: SELECT A.CENTER_CD, A.FLOOR_CD, A.PART_CD, A.PART_NM, A.PART_MAP1, A.PART_MAP2, A.PART_CSS, A.PART_SEAT_RULE, A.PART_MINI_CSS, A.PART_MINI_TOP, A.PART_MINI_LEFT, A.PART_MINI_WIDTH, A.PART_MINI_HEIGHT, A.PART_MINI_ROTATE, A.USE_YN, A.PART_ORDER, A.FRST_REGIST_DTM, A.FRST_REGTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_DTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, B.FLOOR_NM, C.CENTER_NM, D.PART_CLASS_SEQ, FN_DETAILCODENM(D.PART_CLASS) AS PART_CLASS_NM FROM TSEB_PART_INFO_D A, TSEB_FLOOR_INFO_M B, TSEB_CENTER_INFO_M C, TSEB_CENTER_PART_CLASS_D D WHERE A.PART_CD = #{partCd} AND A.FLOOR_CD = B.FLOOR_CD AND A.CENTER_CD = C.CENTER_CD AND A.PART_CLASS_SEQ = D.PART_CLASS_SEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TSEB_PART_INFO_D ( CENTER_CD, FLOOR_CD, PART_CD, PART_NM, PART_MAP1, PART_CLASS, PART_CLASS_SEQ, PART_ORDER, USE_YN, FRST_REGIST_DTM, FRST_REGTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_DTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID ) VALUES ( #{centerCd}, #{floorCd}, FN_PARTCODE(#{floorCd}), #{partNm}, #{partMap1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partClass}, #{partClassSeq}, #{partOrder, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{useYn}, SYSDATE, #{frstRegterId}, SYSDATE, #{lastUpdusrId} )

update.foreach: UPDATE TSEB_PART_INFO_D SET PART_CSS = #{item.partCss, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PART_MINI_LEFT = #{item.partMiniLeft, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PART_MINI_TOP = #{item.partMiniTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PART_MINI_WIDTH = #{item.partMiniWidth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PART_MINI_HEIGHT = #{item.partMiniHeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PART_MINI_ROTATE = #{item.partMiniRotate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_UPDT_DTM = SYSDATE, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{item.lastUpdusrId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE PART_CD = #{item.partCd}

mapper.select: SELECT A.PART_CD, A.PART_NM, A.PART_MINI_TOP, A.PART_MINI_LEFT, PART_MINI_WIDTH, A.PART_MINI_HEIGHT, A.PART_MINI_ROTATE, A.PART_CSS, FN_DETAILCODENM(B.PART_CLASS) AS PART_CLASS_TEXT, ( SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM TSEB_SEAT_INFO_D WHERE PART_CD = A.PART_CD ) AS PART_SEAT_MAX_COUNT, ( SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM TSER_RESV_INFO_I WHERE PART_CD = A.PART_CD AND #{params.resvDate} BETWEEN RESV_START_DT AND RESV_END_DT AND RESV_STATE = 'RESV_STATE_1' ) AS PART_SEAT_USE_COUNT FROM TSEB_PART_INFO_D A, TSEB_CENTER_PART_CLASS_D B WHERE A.FLOOR_CD = #{params.floorCd} AND A.PART_CLASS_SEQ = B.PART_CLASS_SEQ AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.PART_ORDER
